name: EndlessWebWorlds
description: Enter a new way to collaborate and explore EWW is built on an universe of tiny 2.5D online worlds that anyone can create individually and for free. We are creating a platform where people can easily and amusingly learn about projects or other people. Where teams/clans/holders can meet and have fun with various tool sets that we offer. Endless Web Worlds is a sandbox experience unlike any other. Everything may be customized immediately in your browser using the most common programming language, JavaScript. Even if you aren't a developer, you may benefit from the simple snippets that we and the community will provide. Endless Web Worlds allows you to design your own virtual world and personalize it to your liking. The possibilities are unlimited, whether you're constructing a full metropolis, a gaming environment, or a virtual reality! We will also provide a wealth of courses, documentation, and assistance to assist you in getting started.
